user

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • user.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the user that is currently using the Chemistry Passport Program
    Version:
    May 2, 2015
    Author:
    Humaira Orchee, Charlotte Dye, Sehr Sethi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String adventureName, java.lang.String grade, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> kitProgress)
      Creates an user.
      User(java.lang.String adventureName, java.lang.String grade, java.lang.String kitProgressString)
      Creates an user.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAdventureName()
      Returns the adventure name of the user.
      java.lang.String getGrade()
      Return the grade of the user.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getKitProgress()
      Returns the array list of the progress, represented by integers, made by the user in each kit currently existing in the program.
      void setKitProgress(int kitNumber, int progress)
      Lets each kit update the progress the user made for that kit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String adventureName,
    java.lang.String grade,
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> kitProgress)
        Creates an user.
        Parameters:
        adventureName - The name that the user chooses to use for the program instead of their actual name.
        grade - The user's grade.
        kitProgress - The array list of the progress, represented by integers, made by the user in each kit currently existing in the program.

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String adventureName,
    java.lang.String grade,
    java.lang.String kitProgressString)
        Creates an user.
        Parameters:
        adventureName - The name that the user chooses to use for the program instead of their actual name.
        grade - The user's grade.
        kitProgressString - The string of the progress, represented by integers, made by the user in each kit currently existing in the program.

    • Method Detail

      • getAdventureName

        public java.lang.String getAdventureName()
        Returns the adventure name of the user.
        Returns:
        The adventure name of the user.

      • getKitProgress

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getKitProgress()
        Returns the array list of the progress, represented by integers, made by the user in each kit currently existing in the program.
        Returns:
        The array list of the progress, represented by integers, made by the user in each kit currently existing in the program.

      • setKitProgress

        public void setKitProgress(int kitNumber,
                  int progress)
        Lets each kit update the progress the user made for that kit.
        Parameters:
        kitNumber - The number of the kit for which the user's progress has changed. Each kit has an integer associated with them, determined by the order they were added to the program. This number can be found in the config.properties file.
        progress - The new progress of the user in the specified kit.

      • getGrade

        public java.lang.String getGrade()
        Return the grade of the user.
        Returns:
        The grade of the user.
